animeTitle: Mahou no Princess Minky Momo: Yume wo Dakishimete
animeDescription: After the events of the 1st series, Fenarinarsa continues to drift from Earth, so the King asks for help from the kingdom, Marinarsa, to send their daughter, Momo (Who is identical to the 1st one) to Earth to regain humanity's faith in their dreams.
animeRelated: ['Alternative version: Mahou no Princess Minky Momo', 'Side story: Minky Momo in Tabidachi no Eki']
animeStaff: [['Yuyama, Kunihiko', 'Director, Storyboard, Screenplay'], ['Kato, Takao', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Fujimoto, Yoshitaka', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Watanabe, Hiroshi', 'Episode Director, Storyboard, Character Design, Animation Director']]
